name: Tycate
description:
This is a submission to the Themed Horror gamejam 6, where the theme was "Among the stars". So I made a space station level and added spider enemies that you have to kill in order to complete the game.

I didnt manage to finish my game due to that the AI decided to bug out 5 hours before submission. Thats why it is so incomplete, but its playable and you got stuff to do in the level. I will complete the game after the gamejam ends.

Controls:

Press 1,2,3 to spawn guns

Left mouse button: Shoot

Right mouse button: Aim

Q/E: Lean left or right

Left shift: Sprint

Left ctrl: Crouch

Known bugs:

Spiders can see through wall
